columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign associated with this salesman mapping (references a campaign entity outside this table).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman assigned to the campaign (references a salesperson or user entity).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date when this campaign-salesman association was created.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique address identifier.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: Primary address line (local language), typically street name and number.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Secondary address line (local language), often apartment, suite, or additional info.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Tertiary address line usually containing locality and postal code in local language.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Country name (local language) for the address.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate (floating point) for the address location.

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate (floating point) for the address location.

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Type code indicating the geocoding model used or the type of geocode result.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model that produced the geocode result.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Date and time when the address was geocoded or validated by the geo model.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Confidence or quality score returned by the geocoding model (higher is better).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched primary street in the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched secondary street in the geocoding model (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched locality or administrative area in the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal code returned or normalized by the geocoding model (string form).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Country table (identifies country for the address).

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string submitted to the geocoding model (address text used for geocoding).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Primary street name text returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: House or building number for the primary street as returned by the geocode model.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Secondary street name text returned by the geocoding model, if applicable.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: House or building number for the secondary street returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or city name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value returned by the geo model stored as text (string representation).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value returned by the geo model stored as text (string representation).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Codes or identifiers describing broader geo areas or hierarchies associated with the geocode result.

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal code stored in numeric form (integer) where available.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative subdivision returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Area name (smaller administrative unit) returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key used to link this address to another data source or dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset that contributed this address record.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key for linking to external data sources.

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code representing geocode classification or match type.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1 value was manually overridden by a user.

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: Primary address line in English (translated or transliterated).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Secondary address line in English, if available.

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Tertiary address line in English, typically locality and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Country name in English for the address.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Primary street name returned by the geocode model in English (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street name returned by the geocode model in English (if available).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality or city name returned by the geocoding model in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative subdivision in English as returned by the geo model.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area name in English returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the English Line1 value was manually overridden by a user.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: House/building number for the primary street in English as returned by the geocode model.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: House/building number for the secondary street in English as returned by the geocode model.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable policy name. Typically shown in UI lists and selection controls.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Optional longer text describing the policy purpose, conditions or notes.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the policy.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the policy.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value used by the policy (e.g., percent of advance). Nullable when not percentage-based.

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (plafon) for the advanced payment policy. Stored as decimal; may be null if no ceiling applies.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule/expression (XML/XAML) that defines conditions when the policy applies. Typically used by runtime rule engine.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active and should be considered by business logic.

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional serialized calculator or formula (text) used to compute advance amounts. May contain code or expression text.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed monetary amount for the advance. Stored as decimal; currency hint is USD in source stats.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key - unique identifier for the discount policy.

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Integer code indicating the discount type (enumeration). Use business mapping to interpret values.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Readable name for the discount policy shown in UI and reports.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Detailed description explaining the discount policy and purpose.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount policy is active.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the discount policy record was created (may be null).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of last modification to the policy (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the policy (may be null).

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Discount percentage for this policy. Nullable when not percentage-based.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed discount monetary amount. Stored as decimal; currency hint is USD in source stats.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional serialized rule or expression (text) defining when the discount applies. May be null for simple policies.

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount applies at unit level (true) or at aggregate level (false).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Optional percentage discount for bundle type 1. Mostly null in sample data.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Optional percentage discount for bundle type 2. Nullable.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Optional percentage discount for bundle type 3. Nullable.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Optional percentage discount for bundle type 4. Nullable.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Optional percentage discount applied to other bundle sizes. Nullable.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage) that may be applied automatically. Nullable when unrestricted.

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage) that a supervisor may authorize. Nullable.

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage) that an area manager may authorize. Nullable.

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage) that a sales manager may authorize. Nullable.

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount (percentage) that a salesman may authorize. Nullable.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart numeric key for external integration. Currently all null in sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: External data mart table name used for integration. Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: External data mart character key used for integration. Nullable.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 1. Nullable in most rows.

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 2. Nullable.

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 3. Nullable.

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 4. Nullable.

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for other products. Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description (Greek) of why an advertisement was deactivated.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short code or description representing the sales type (stored as text, sample values like ST1, ST2, ST3).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key linking to an external data model table (nullable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data model table this sales type maps to (nullable).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional textual key used for mapping to an external data model (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business code or number value that was archived; primary human-readable code for this record.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the archived number is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the archived number record; references dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number record.

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute category or group; textual ID stored as NVARCHAR.

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Type or category code for the attribute (stored as text); indicates attribute classification.

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute (e.g., Internet_Cities); used as the primary label for attribute entries.

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the attribute name (e.g., locale code such as 1032).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for the specific attribute value instance (stored as text).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Localized, human-readable attribute value or label (may contain language-specific characters).

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the attribute value (locale code) to indicate the language of AttributeValue.

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes associated with this attribute value (may be 'None').

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition. Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key referencing dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID.

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand allowed for the rule condition. Part of the composite primary key. Foreign key referencing dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Official name or description of the bank (e.g., ALPHA BANK, EUROBANK). This is the primary human-readable label for the bank.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the bank is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step associated with this mapping; groups mappings by migration activity.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the original (source) attribute before migration; the attribute being remapped.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the new (target) attribute that the old attribute maps to after migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step associated with this value mapping; may be null when mapping is global.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original (source) attribute value that is being remapped.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new (target) attribute value that the old value maps to after migration.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with the keyword mapping. Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier for the keyword. Chosen as the human-readable label column for this mapping.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value that the keyword maps to during migration.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source entity being merged. Unique per row and serves as the primary key for this mapping.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target entity into which the source is merged.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original attribute value that should be replaced.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that will replace the original value.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that is targeted for replacement.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that will replace the original keyword.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity. Part of the composite primary key linking an activity to an attribute value. Likely references an Activity master table.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value associated with the activity. Part of the composite primary key and likely references an AttributeValue or Lookup table.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the activity (lookup code). Used to join to related activity records.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Human-readable activity name in Greek (NVARCHAR, Greek collation). Use this for Greek-language displays and lookups.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: Human-readable activity name in English (NVARCHAR). Preferred label for user interfaces and searches.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the geographic area (e.g., S80125).

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Primary display name for the area. Concatenated/normalized representation used for labels and lookups.

attributes.name: Name_
attributes.description: Nominative form of the area name in Greek.

attributes.name: Name_
attributes.description: Genitive form of the area name in Greek (when provided).

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional qualifiers or specifiers for the area name (e.g., type, disambiguation).

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate integer key for the calendar row.

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Calendar date (full date/time).

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Human readable description for the date (e.g., holiday name).

attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: Derived calendar year extracted from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: MonthName
attributes.description: Derived month name (e.g., January) from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: Day
attributes.description: Day of month derived from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the star rating value (string encoded numeric id)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable star rating in English (e.g., '1 star', '2 stars')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the star rating value (string encoded numeric id)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human readable star rating in Greek (e.g., '1 ', '2 ')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code identifier for the transaction type (string NVARCHAR)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Transaction type label in Greek (human-readable category)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/code identifier for the unit type (string NVARCHAR)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Unit / accommodation type label in English (human-readable category)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the unit type / attribute value (string-coded id)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek-language unit type name or attribute value (e.g., 'o', boutique descriptions, resort/club etc.)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the functional month attribute

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name for functional use (raw values may include trailing separators like 'June||')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the functional month (stored as string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Name of the month in Greek. Values may include trailing delimiters ("||").

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the payment method (stored as string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Payment method description in English (may include trailing delimiters like "||").

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier / code for the payment way (stored as string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Greek label for the payment method (user-facing name)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier/code for the room keys attribute (stored as string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English label describing the number of keys (e.g., '1 key', '2 keys')

attributes.name: KeyCount
attributes.description: Parsed numeric count of keys extracted from AttributeValue (derived). Useful for numeric aggregation and drill-down.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Stable identifier for the room-keys attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Label describing number of room keys in Greek (e.g., '1 ', '2 ').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Stable identifier for the arrival-time attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time expressed as HH:MM (24-hour), e.g. '01:00', '14:30'.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the arrival time value (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time in HH:MM format (Greek localized values)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the departure time value (string)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time in HH:MM format (English localized values)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time as HH:mm (stored in Greek view). Example values: '01:00', '14:30'.

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23). Useful for hourly roll-ups and aggregations.

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name indicating high season. Source values may include trailing delimiters (e.g. 'January||'); cleaned value contains the month name only.

attributes.name: MonthNumber
attributes.description: Numeric month order derived from the month name (1 = January, 12 = December). Used for correct chronological sorting.

attributes.name: Quarter
attributes.description: Quarter of the year derived from MonthNumber (Q1..Q4).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in Greek (values contain trailing characters '||' in source). Represents months considered part of high season.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in English (values contain trailing characters '||' in source). Represents months considered part of low season.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded for this payment method.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount per payment method record.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Smallest payment amount in the set of payment method records.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Largest payment amount in the set of payment method records.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows). Use this to count payments captured in the table.

measures.name: DistinctReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers associated with these payments (excludes NULLs). Useful for measuring unique receipts referenced.

measures.name: SumPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values. Note: PolicyAmount is almost entirely NULL in the source; this measure will usually be zero or NULL and should be used with caution.

measures.name: PolicyAmountPresenceRate
measures.description: Proportion of payment records that have a non-NULL PolicyAmount. Very low in this dataset (high null rate).

measures.name: Payment Amount (Sum)
measures.description: Total monetary amount for payments recorded in this row set. Uses Amount column; NULLs are ignored.

measures.name: Payment Count
measures.description: Number of payment records (rows) represented in the aggregation. ID is the row-level identifier (grain).

measures.name: Average Payment Amount
measures.description: Average payment amount across matching rows. NULL Amounts are excluded from the average.

measures.name: Minimum Payment Amount
measures.description: Smallest payment amount observed in the current aggregation.

measures.name: Maximum Payment Amount
measures.description: Largest payment amount observed in the current aggregation.

measures.name: Policy Amount (Sum)
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount where present. This column is sparsely populated in the source and may be NULL for many rows.

measures.name: Distinct System Receipt Count
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers present in the filtered set. Useful to identify unique receipts when SystemReceiptNumber is populated.

measures.name: Average Credit Card Installments
measures.description: Average number of installments for credit card payments. Column is predominantly NULL in the sample; treat with care.

measures.name: PaymentLinkCount
measures.description: Total number of rows linking advanced payment methods to sales collections. Each row represents an association between one AdvancedPaymentMethod and one SalesCollection.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollectionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct SalesCollection records that have one or more associated advanced payment methods.

measures.name: DistinctAdvancedPaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advanced payment methods that are associated with one or more sales collections.

measures.name: AveragePaymentMethodsPerSalesCollection
measures.description: Average number of advanced payment methods linked to each SalesCollection (total links divided by distinct SalesCollections). Returns null when there are no SalesCollections in the current filter context.

measures.name: AdCount
measures.description: Number of advertisement records

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of advertised prices

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average advertised price per advertisement

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount types applied to advertisements (explicit + rules + payment/product/bundle discounts)

measures.name: TotalNetRevenue
measures.expression: SUM(Price - Discount - RulesDiscount - COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) - COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) - COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0))
measures.description: Net revenue after subtracting all discounts from Price

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of manual/altered amounts (many rows null)

measures.name: TotalBudgetAmount
measures.description: Sum of planned budgets for advertisements

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time charges before discount

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of one-time charges after discount adjustments

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees applied to advertisements

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discount adjustments

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after credit-card / post-charge processing

measures.name: TotalAlteredPPCAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of altered pay-per-click amounts after credit-card processing

measures.name: TotalActualSpentBudget
measures.description: Actual spent budget recorded for advertisements

measures.name: SumMonths
measures.description: Total of Months values (where provided)

measures.name: SumCompletedChanges
measures.description: Aggregate of CompletedChanges flag/count across advertisements

measures.name: ActiveAdCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvEndDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements that have no end date (considered active)

measures.name: AdDurationDays
measures.description: Total active days across advertisements (uses AdvEndDate or current date if not set)

measures.name: AverageAdDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days of advertisements (uses AdvEndDate or current date if not set)

measures.name: Extract Event Count
measures.description: Total number of extraction events (each row is one recorded extraction event).

measures.name: Successful Extracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events where Status = 0 (assumes Status = 0 denotes success).

measures.name: Failed Extracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events where Status is not 0 (assumes non-zero indicates failure or non-success states).

measures.name: Paid Extracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of extracts of type = 1 (sample data suggests this corresponds to 'paid' template runs).

measures.name: Free Extracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of extracts of type = 2 (sample data suggests this corresponds to 'free' template runs).

measures.name: Both-Type Extracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of extracts of type = 0 (sample data suggests this indicates extracting both free and paid listings).

measures.name: Unique Extract Days
measures.description: Number of distinct calendar days on which extracts were run.

measures.name: Average Extracts per Day
measures.description: Average number of extract events per day over the selected period (avoids division by zero).

measures.name: Last Extract Timestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent recorded extract event.

measures.name: DepositCount
measures.description: Number of deposit detail records (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctDepositNumbers
measures.description: Number of distinct bank deposit identifiers recorded.

measures.name: BanksCovered
measures.description: Count of distinct banks referenced by these deposit detail records.

measures.name: FirstDepositDate
measures.description: Earliest deposit timestamp for the grouped records.

measures.name: LastDepositDate
measures.description: Most recent deposit timestamp for the grouped records.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastDeposit
measures.description: Number of days from the most recent deposit in the group until today.

measures.name: DepositNumberCompleteness
measures.description: Percentage of records that have a non-null, non-empty BankDepositNumber (data completeness).

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of batch action history records in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Sum
measures.description: Total number of rows affected by batch actions. Nulls are ignored by SUM; treat as zero where appropriate in reporting.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Avg
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Min
measures.description: Minimum rows affected by a single action in the current context.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Max
measures.description: Maximum rows affected by a single action in the current context.

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions recorded with Status = 1 (successful actions).

measures.name: FailureCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions recorded with Status = 0 (failed or not-successful actions).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0))
measures.description: Proportion of actions that are successful (Status = 1) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctActionTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batch action types observed.

measures.name: DistinctTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct values in the Type column (categorical type codes).
